QuestData.Title: And That's Why They Call Them Peons...
QuestData.Description: These two are USELESS! When they first arrived I thought we were saved. Not so! Instead, Dontrag and Utvoch took one look at the mine and concocted some idiotic plan that involved standing here until... until we all died, I guess. $B$BYou don't look nearly as useless. How about you lend a hand, friend? I've got dozens of peons, scared out of their gourds, hiding in the Deep Reaches. Find them and get them out!
